headline.main: Consumer Reports to Consider Cyber Security in Product Reviews
headline.print_headline: Consumer Reports to Consider Cyber Security in Product Reviews

lead_paragraph: Consumer Reports, an influential U.S. non-profit group that conducts extensive reviews of cars, kitchen appliances and other goods, is gearing up to start considering cyber security and privacy safeguards when scoring products.
snippet: Consumer Reports, an influential U.S. non-profit group that conducts extensive reviews of cars, kitchen appliances and other goods, is gearing up to start considering cyber security and privacy safeguards when scoring products....
